newsfeed.content: We will be presenting a poster: "First Phycocyanin Retrievals from NASA PACE: A Physics-Informed AI Approach for Cyanobacteria Biomass Estimation"
We will be presenting a poster: "Exploring Atmospheric Correction Methods for PACE‑Based HAB Retrieval"
We will be presenting a poster: "US-Wide Assessment of a Physics-informed AI Framework for Cyanobacteria Biomass Estimation: First Results from NASA’s Hyperspectral PACE Mission"
We will be presenting a poster: "Bridging Temporal Gaps: Cross-sensor Assessment of GOES-ABI, MODIS & VIIRS for Diurnal Monitoring of CyanoHABs"
We will be presenting a paper: "Adapting CyAN Framework to Hyperspectral Data: Enhanced CyanoHAB Detection and Monitoring Using NASA’s PACE Satellite"
We will be presenting a poster: "An Integrated approach for Ground-to-Space Monitoring of Cyanobacterial Harmful Algal Blooms for US Freshwaters"
newsfeed.conference: American Association of Geographers (AAG) Annual Meeting 2026
